sect2.title: Installation of NAS
sect2.para: Install NAS by running the following commands:

userinput.command: xmkmf && make Makefiles && make includes && make depend && make && make INCROOT=/usr/include USRLIBDIR=/usr/lib \ MANPATH=/usr/share/man BINDIR=/usr/bin \ LIBDIR=/usr/lib CONFIGDIR=/usr/X11R6/lib/X11/config \ install install.man
